title: Bystander in car is shot after argument turns violent: police
body: A 29-year-old woman sitting in a car was injured in a shooting Monday morning in Jersey City, authorities said.The woman, who was not the intended target, was taken to a local hospital and treated for injuries that were not considered life-threatening and then released, Jersey City spokeswoman Kimberly Wallace-Scalcione said.Police responded to the area of Oak Street and Martin Luther King Drive at 8:30 a.m. and they found the victim still in the car.It appears that the gunfire stemmed from a verbal dispute between two people inside a nearby building, Wallace-Scalcione said. The investigation is ongoing.Note to readers: if you purchase something through one of our affiliate links we may earn a commission.
